所有软件包的分层结构

软件包分层结构：
org.comet4j.core, org.comet4j.core.dto, org.comet4j.core.event, org.comet4j.core.exception, org.comet4j.core.interfaces, org.comet4j.core.listener, org.comet4j.core.util, org.comet4j.event

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.comet4j.core.util.BeanUtil
    • org.comet4j.core.util.CharacterEncodingFilter (implements javax.servlet.Filter)
    • org.comet4j.core.CometAppListener (implements javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionAttributeListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, javax.servlet.ServletRequestListener)
    • org.comet4j.core.CometConnection
    • org.comet4j.core.CometMessage
    • org.comet4j.core.CometProtocol
    • org.comet4j.core.CometSender
    • org.comet4j.core.dto.ConnectionDTO
    • org.comet4j.core.dto.DTO
    • org.comet4j.event.Event<O>
      • org.comet4j.core.event.BeforeConnectEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.BeforeDropEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.BeforeRemoveEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.CometContextEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.ConnectEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.DropEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.DyingEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.ErrorEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.MessageEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.RemovedEvent
      • org.comet4j.core.event.RevivalEvent
    • org.comet4j.event.EventSource<E,L>
    • org.comet4j.core.ExpiresCache
    • org.comet4j.core.util.ExplorerUtil
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet (implements java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig)
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet (implements java.io.Serializable)
        • org.comet4j.core.CometServlet (implements org.apache.catalina.CometProcessor)
    • org.comet4j.core.util.JSONUtil
    • org.comet4j.core.Language
    • org.comet4j.event.Listener<E> (implements org.comet4j.event.ListenerInterface<E>)
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.BeforeConnectListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.BeforeDropListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.BeforeRemoveListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.CometContextListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.ConnectListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.DropListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.DyingListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.ErrorListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.MessageListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.RemovedListener
      • org.comet4j.core.listener.RevivalListener
    • org.comet4j.core.util.NetUtil
    • org.comet4j.event.Observable<E,L>
      • org.comet4j.core.CometConnector
      • org.comet4j.core.CometContext
      • org.comet4j.core.CometEngine
    • org.comet4j.event.SubEvent
    • org.comet4j.event.SubEventType
    • java.lang.Throwable (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.comet4j.core.exception.CometException
            • org.comet4j.core.exception.DoubleAppModuleKeyException
